items.title: US military to stop shooting pigs and goats as a way to train medics for the battlefield
items.description: The U.S. military will end its practice of shooting pigs and goats to help prepare medics for treating wounded troops in a combat zone

items.title: South Sudanese army officer and soldiers arrested over death of UN staff member
items.description: A United Nations staff member has been found dead in South Sudan after being taken into custody by security personnel
